allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: CAD project with skills and sample LEGO 2x4 brick

- Add Claude Code skills: /part-gen, /dim-view, /cad-template
- Add sample LEGO 2x4 brick \(OpenSCAD model, STL export, dimensioned SVG\)
- Add pure Python STL exporter \(zero dependencies\)
- Add project structure for parametric 3D-print part design

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add MagSafe mountain stand and pic-to-part skill

- Add /pic-to-part skill for image-to-3D-model workflow
- Add MagSafe mountain stand \(OpenSCAD + STL export\)
  - Mountain body with rock texture, MagSafe pocket, cross, coin tray, book
  - Sized for AD5X: 130mm dia x 128mm tall
  - 4-color print zones mapped for IFS system
- Update skills with Flashforge AD5X printer specs
  - Build volume validation \(220x220x220mm\)
  - Nozzle/tolerance settings for 0.4mm nozzle
  - Multi-color design rules

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
